column3: While touching this test, mind renaming `MAX_VALUE` to `MAX_SLEEP_TIME` (per `src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp:1884`) and moving the definition up to the top of the file or using local variable naming, e.g. `max_sleep_time`.
There are several of both `int(time.time())` and `time.time()` in the test. Standardize on one of the two?
They rounding needs to be exactly the way it is, otherwise the test wouldn't pass
